synopsis.text: Since the dawn of the future, robots have become an integral part of everyday life, serving their owners with unwavering dedication. Enter Takaya Murase, an ordinary young man with a penchant for the extraordinary, who has just acquired a new maid android, Yui, from the renowned robotic doll distributor, MaidWorks. Eager to embark on a life of cooking, cleaning, and serving her new master, Yui finds herself in the midst of an unexpected twist. Takaya, driven by his vivid imagination and creative flair, has a unique set of plans for his new companion. Instead of the mundane chores she anticipated, Yui is thrust into a world of elaborate costumes and fantastical dress-ups, much to her initial chagrin. As time passes, their unconventional relationship blossoms, and Yui discovers a world beyond her wildest dreams, filled with adventure, self-discovery, and the unbreakable bond between a master and his android.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
